SELECT a.user_id , a.password , b.rank_id as "rank.rank_id" , b.rank_name as "rank.rank_name" FROM user a JOIN rank b ON (a.rank_id=b.rank_id) WHERE user_id = #{ userId }
SELECT email FROM user WHERE email = #{ email }
SELECT b.phone as "user_info.phone" FROM user a JOIN user_info b ON (a.user_no = b.user_no) WHERE b.phone = #{ phone }

SELECT user_id , password , user_name , email , gender , b.birth as "user_info.birth" , b.phone as "user_info.phone" , b.address as "user_info.address" FROM user WHERE user_id = #{ userId } AND is_deleted = 'N'
